title: Floyd Mayweather Robbed, MTH, Michigan Shooting, Wendy Williams and more.
itunes:title: Floyd Mayweather Robbed, MTH, Michigan Shooting, Wendy Williams and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! "Huh get yo ass whooped 'round here!" The CLO must explain a situation involving a manipulative mother-in-law. Rev. Adnoid is in for Deacon Def Jam and we get a new level of igurosity inside Church Complaints. VP Kamala Harris made history again. A man in Michigan has pending doom to look forward to. Fool #2 murders another one in the spirit of Johnny Gill. The Greek Freak made it do what it does in Cream City. The fellas are asked a specific question that is tied to waiting. The Earl of Ottingham talks about The Queen of England. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve quotes MLK, "A man can't ride your back unless it's bent."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
